meanings.definition: A person or thing that defeats or overcomes another
meanings.sent1: The brave knight was the defeater of the dragon.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team's captain was the ultimate defeater in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel became the unexpected defeater of the big, bad wolf.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of good versus evil, the hero emerged as the ultimate defeater.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's secret power was being the undefeatable defeater of all villains.

meanings.definition: Something that renders a claim or argument ineffective
meanings.sent1: The solid evidence presented was the defeater of the false accusation.
meanings.sent2: The flaw in the logic was the main defeater of the theory.
meanings.sent3: The clever twist in the story served as the unexpected defeater of the villain's plan.
meanings.sent4: The undeniable truth acted as the ultimate defeater of the deceitful scheme.
meanings.sent5: The clear contradiction was the unbeatable defeater of the faulty argument.
